pageContent: Purpose: To review the recently published contemporary long-term outcomes from tertiary care urologic practices comparing brachytherapy-based management strategies and radical prostatectomy (RP) across intermediate- and high-risk groups.

metaData.source:
Communication Network Structures and Content of Men with Prostate Cancer: Models for Explaining Health-Related Quality of Life
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28278606/
